text: Edmond Eugène Alexis Rostand (, , ; 1 April 1868 – 2 December 1918) was a French poet and dramatist. He is known for his works which are known as neo- romanticism. His best known play was the 1897 play Cyrano de Bergerac. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1918 deaths Category:French poets Category:French playwrights Category:Writers from Paris
title: Edmond Rostand
